Description.Text: Clanard court is a delightful 4* hotel with beautiful gardens; just 1 hour from Dublin and 1km from Athy Town, it boasts 37 superbly appointed rooms with all modern conveniences including WiFi. Rooms at the Clanard Hotel have bathrooms with baths, power showers and hairdryers. Revive Treatment room on site. It is a family run hotel with strong emphasis on customer service.
